metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3858 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out of bounds read flaw was discovered in libssh2 before 1.8.1 when a specially crafted SFTP packet is received from the server. A remote attacker who compromises a SSH server may be able to cause a Denial of Service or read data in the client memory. It was discovered that libssh2 incorrectly handled specially crafted SFTP packets. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or obtain sensitive information.

criterions.comment: libssh2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
